mcq.statement: Finding out the correct sentence: Poor and needy suffer much. It is pity, The poor and the needy suffer much. What a pity? Poor and needy suffer much. What a great pity?, The poors and the needy suffer too much. What not a pity?

options.a: Poor and needy suffer much. It is pity
options.b: The poor and the needy suffer much. What a pity!
options.c: Poor and needy suffer much. What a great pity! The poors and the needy suffer too much. What not a pity!
